name: AutoMonAdFly
author: Harry Sudana, I Nym

sections.description:
AutoMonAdFly is a wordpress plugins that will automatically parse and shorter your external URL in Post Content. Not only that, your adfly url can also masked using other shortener url service so then your visitor will see there is no adfly link on your site.

** If you want cache works, you need this plugins WP Plugin Cache **

** Need a CURL, how to check it? this is the tutorial How to know the curl ready on the server **

Developers

not yet documented

Services

not yet documented
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire wpadflyshortner folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. There is options screen please done it.

short_description: Automatic Shorten a URL in content post using AdFly and masked with other Shortner Services
